subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The leader of the 11th-ranked Hoyas, Chris Wright, missed his team’s 58-51 loss to No. 17 Syracuse after surgery to repair a broken left hand.
snippet: The leader of the 11th-ranked Hoyas, Chris Wright, missed his team’s 58-51 loss to No. 17 Syracuse after surgery to repair a broken left hand.
